title: Cardinal

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Choose a dead player that was Striked. You will receive all notifications that they received on the night they died, and you will take their Strike back. Taking a Strike back from a dead player will negate that strike from counting towards your last two attributes.
- Choose an alive player. If they die tonight, they will perform their all of their night abilities on their attacker (if applicable).
- Prepare a Strike on a player. Strikes are announced the following morning.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- If one or more Striked players are alive, you will learn the identity of your target’s attacker for your second ability.
- If two or more Striked players are alive, gain Basic defense.
- If any Striked players have died, you will receive the logs of the previous night’s dead chat at the start of the day.
- If two or more Striked players have died, all dead Thundercry may communicate in the Thundercry chat.
